globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
Jabba’s convoy arrives with a squad of Gamorreans and Weequay. The civilians look frightened at the arrival of the motley and intimidating assortment of mercenaries, but you assure them that they are here to help. Finally, Bib Fortuna emerges from the shuttle and begins to set up a plan with you.

“We have coordinates for a small base not far from here where we believe Terro is preparing his ambush,” he informs you. “We'll leave a smalll garrison here for protection in your absence, and then you can storm their base and take them by surprise. If you can slice their system, you should be able to override their energy controls and trigger a  self-destruct of the base.”

You gather your gear and kiss your family goodbye before trudging through the forest with a pair of Gamorreans Bib Fortuna identified as the captains.

eventActions.abilities:
Gamorrean Honor Guard:While defending during a {O} attack, apply +1 {G} to the defense results.
Professional:While attacking, you may reroll 1 attack die.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} The door is locked.
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead, When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.
As you approach the base, you hear the blare of an Imperial alarm followed immediately by the roar of jetpacks as stormtroopers fly out to engage you.
More enemies are protecting the base.
The outerior lock of the door to the base is controlled by three security stations.

entityProperties.name: Terminal 1
entityProperties.theText:
A security station has been erected at the top of the stairs.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a terminal (Health: 6, Defense: 2 {G}).
{-} When all terminals are destroyed, the door unlocks to Rebel figures.

entityProperties.name: Terminal 2
entityProperties.theText:
A security station has been erected at the top of the stairs.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a terminal (Health: 6, Defense: 2 {G}).
{-} When all terminals are destroyed, the door unlocks to Rebel figures.

entityProperties.name: Terminal 3
entityProperties.theText:
A security station has been erected in the corner.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a terminal (Health: 6, Defense: 2 {G}).
{-} When all terminals are destroyed, the door unlocks to Rebel figures.

eventActions.theText:
You return fire as you advance towards the terminals.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a terminal (Health: 6, Defense: 2 {G}).
{-} When all terminals are destroyed, the door unlocks to Rebel figures.
{-} The mission will progress when both terminals are destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.
Destroy the security stations (&Terminals Destroyed&/3).

{-} The door is locked.
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead, When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.
{-} A Rebel figure can attack a terminal (Health: 6, Defense: 2 {G}).
{-} When all terminals are destroyed, the door unlocks to Rebel figures.
{-} The mission will progress when both terminals are destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
You scramble away from the site of the base as it begins to crumble and burn. Captain Terro, lying on the ground, coughs out a final taunt to you, "You fools. We've all been pawns. Jabba sent me here himself to attack you. Now we're all out of his way. Plus, you have just hand-delivered him a fresh supply of slaves for his trade. You...Rebel...fools..."

You run as fast as you can back to the civilians' new settlement, but you return to find it raided and empty. A few charred buildings and scattered weapons are the only signs of battle, and Jabba’s team and shuttle are nowhere to be seen.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Each hero receives 2 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.
{-} Place Story Mission card "Storming the Palace" into play.

eventActions.theText: Is there only 1 healthy hero?

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
"Drop your weapons and surrender," Terro snaps at you, and you're forced to oblige. "You Rebel fools," he says. "You have been pawns. I was sent here by Jabba to disrupt this whole operation. His protection only extended to your civilian friends while they were on Tatooine. And now I'll be bringing you back to him." Jabba's mercenaries chuckle maliciously. 

"I'm sure he will be appreciative for the fresh batch of slaves you will have hand-delivered to his trade, though." He pulls out a holographic image of Weequay and Gamorreans loading your friends and family onto a Hutt freighter, burning the settlement behind them.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.
{-} Place Story Mission card "Mutiny" into play.

eventActions.theText: Has <color="red">Captain Terro</color> suffered any {H}?

globalEvents.name: Reinforcements
globalEvents.eventText: More troopers rush out to meet your assault on the facility.

globalEvents.name: Destroy Terminal 1
globalEvents.eventText: The security station collapses in a shower of sparks.

entityProperties.name: Terminal 1
entityProperties.theText:
A security station has been erected at the top of the stairs.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a terminal (Health: 6, Defense: 2 {G}).

globalEvents.eventText: The security station collapses in a shower of sparks.

globalEvents.name: Door Unlocks
globalEvents.eventText:
As the last security station explodes, you can hear the heavy locks sliding off the door to the base.

{-} The door is now unlocked.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the base is opened.

eventActions.theText: Block access to the door.

entityProperties.name: Outpost Door
entityProperties.theText: A sturdy security door leads into Terro's base.

eventActions.theText: Open the door to the base.

{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead, When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the base is opened.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Interior Guard
globalEvents.eventText: The door slides open to reveal a small Imperial facility.

entityProperties.name: Outpost Door
entityProperties.theText:
A sturdy security door leads into Terro's base.

{-} The door is locked.

eventActions.theText: You see flashes of red as royal guards charge forward from their post to bar your entry.
Behind them, a frightened looking officer yells into a com system, “They're here; they're inside the base! Alert the captain!”
The base's power core lies in the middle of the facility, humming and vibrating.

entityProperties.name: Power Core
entityProperties.theText:
The power core is humming and vibrating softly.

{-} The Imperial mission token represents the power core. A hero can interact with the power core ({K} or {I}) to try and initiate the self-destruct. That hero may suffer 2 {C} before performing the test to apply +1 {B} to the results.

eventActions.theText:
If you overload the power core, you can detonate it, destroying the base.

{-} The Imperial mission token represents the power core. A hero can interact with the power core ({K} or {I}) to try and initiate the self-destruct. That hero may suffer 2 {C} before performing the test to apply +1 {B} to the results. 
{-} The mission will progress when the self-destruct is initiated.
Block access to the power core.
Initiate the self-destruct.

{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead, When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.
{-} The Imperial mission token represents the power core. A hero can interact with the power core ({K} or {I}) to try and initiate the self-destruct. That hero may suffer 2 {C} before performing the test to apply +1 {B} to the results. 
{-} The mission will progress when the self-destruct is initiated.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

You hastily start sabotaging the power core.

{-} Test {I} or {K}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the power core, then discard all strain tokens on the power core. You may suffer 2 {C} before peforming the test to apply +1 {B} to the results.

inputList.theText:
You make some progress, but there is still work to do. You need to keep trying.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the power core for each {B} result gained.

globalEvents.name: Betrayal - Gammos
globalEvents.eventText:
As you trigger the final input on the console to destroy the facility, you turn to your Gamorrean companions to clear the path for your escape. Instead, they move to block you. "Jabba has other plans," they grunt, raising their vibro-axes.

{-} Place the <color="red">Gamorrean Guards</color> on the indicated spaces and withdraw them as allies. The <color="red">Gamorrean Guards</color> recover all {H}.
{-} The <color="red">Gamorrean Guards</color> are no longer Rebel figures and are not controlled by the heroes. They are Imperial figures.

entityProperties.name: Power Core
entityProperties.theText: The power core is growing brighter and warmer with every passing second.

eventActions.theText:
Behind them, the door slams shut again.

{-} The door does not block movement, adjacency, counting spaces, or line of sight for Imperial figures.

entityProperties.name: Outpost Door
entityProperties.theText:
The door has slammed shut behind Jabba's mercenaries.

{-} The door does not block movement, adjacency, counting spaces, or line of sight for Imperial figures.

eventActions.theText: From the outside, you hear the Imperial forces cheering as Captain Terro appears on his dewback.

<color="red">Captain Terro</color>: Move to the Extraction Zone.
{-} All others: Block access to the Extraction Zone.

The heat from the overcharged power core is growing worse and worse. You need to get out. Fast.

{-} At the end of each Round, each Rebel figure on an interior space suffers 2 {H}.
{-} When all heroes are on the extraction zone and <color="red">Captain Terro</color> is not, click the green highlight and select "Heroes Depart".
{-} The Rebels win when the heroes depart.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

entityProperties.name: Extraction 1
entityProperties.theText:
To make sure you're not caught in the blast of the detonation, you need to get far enough away from the facility.

{-} When all heroes are on the extraction zone and <color="red">Captain Terro</color> is not, click "Heroes Depart" to end the mission.

globalEvents.name: Open Outpost Door
globalEvents.eventText: The door slides open again, and cool air rushes in.

entityProperties.name: Outpost Door
entityProperties.theText:
A sturdy security door leads into Terro's base.

{-} The door is locked.

globalEvents.name: Betrayal - Weequays
globalEvents.eventText: As you trigger the final input on the console to destroy the facility, two Weequay mercenaries you have seen in Jabba's services enter through the door. You turn to them, expecting them to clear the path for your escape. Instead, they move to block you. "Jabba has other plans," they growl, raising their blasters.

globalEvents.name: Healthy Hero Yes
globalEvents.eventText: Increase the threat level of the next mission (and only the next mission) by 1. During the Rebel Upgrade stage, the Rebel players can decide to spend 50 credits per hero to prevent this.

globalEvents.name: Captain Terro Yes
globalEvents.eventText: Because <color="red">Captain Terro</color> has suffered {H}, heroes receive 25 credits per hero.
